java/liquibase/database/sql/TagDatabaseStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.MySQLDatabase;
00005 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00006 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00007 
00008 public class TagDatabaseStatement implements SqlStatement {
00009 
00010     private String tag;
00011 
00012     public TagDatabaseStatement(String tag) {
00013         this.tag = tag;
00014     }
00015 
00016     public String getTag() {
00017         return tag;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00021         UpdateStatement statement = new UpdateStatement(database.getDefaultSchemaName(), database.getDatabaseChangeLogTableName());
00022         statement.addNewColumnValue("TAG", tag);
00023         if (database instanceof MySQLDatabase) {
00024             try {
00025                 long version = Long.parseLong(database.getDatabaseProductVersion().substring(0,1));
00026 
00027                 if (version < 5) {
00028                     return new RawSqlStatement("UPDATE DATABASECHANGELOG C LEFT JOIN (SELECT MAX(DATEEXECUTED) as MAXDATE FROM (SELECT DATEEXECUTED FROM`DATABASECHANGELOG`) AS X) D ON C.DATEEXECUTED = D.MAXDATE SET C.TAG = '"+tag+"'").getSqlStatement(database);
00029                 }
00030 
00031             } catch (Throwable e) {
00032                 ; //assume it is version 5
00033             }
00034             statement.setWhereClause("DATEEXECUTED = (SELECT MAX(DATEEXECUTED) FROM (SELECT DATEEXECUTED FROM " + database.escapeTableName(database.getDefaultSchemaName(), database.getDatabaseChangeLogTableName())+") AS X)");
00035         } else {
00036             statement.setWhereClause("DATEEXECUTED = (SELECT MAX(DATEEXECUTED) FROM " + database.escapeTableName(database.getDefaultSchemaName(), database.getDatabaseChangeLogTableName())+")");
00037         }
00038 
00039         return statement.getSqlStatement(database);
00040 
00041     }
00042 
00043     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00044         return ";";
00045     }
00046 
00047     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00048         return true;
00049     }
00050 }
